description: BobCAD-CAM software provides CAD and CAM features for Mill, Mill Turn, Lathe, Router, Waterjet, Plasma, Laser, and Wire EDM machines. Various users, from advanced aerospace engineers to amateur hobbyists, use the software to design and manufacture parts.
To create a BBCDX file, select File → New , modify the file, then select File → Save or Save as and choose the BBCDX format from the "Save as type" dropdown menu.
